headline: Will Advocate Health's Massive Go-Live Redefine Workday's (WDAY) Role in Healthcare Transformation?
summary: Workday announced that Advocate Health has successfully implemented Workday Human Capital Management, Financial Management, and Supply Chain Management solutions across its 160,000-employee organization, centralizing critical operations on a unified, AI-powered platform. This large-scale go-live underscores Workday’s capacity to enable digital transformation for complex healthcare systems, highlighting the scalability and integrated efficiency of its enterprise software. We’ll explore how...
